text: Roger de Saxenhurst was Archdeacon of Leicester from 1275 to 1294: he was also Prebendary of St Margaret, Leicester in Lincoln Cathedral.University of Leicester == Notes == ==Also see== * Diocese of Lincoln * Diocese of Peterborough * Diocese of Leicester * Archdeacon of Leicester Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:13th-century English people Category:Lincoln Cathedral
title: Roger de Saxenhurst
